#summary Retrieve the root folder UUID and owner UUID for the shared inventory library.
#labels Protocol-Inventory

= Request Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* || *Required* ||
||`RequestMethod`||GetLibraryRoot||String||Yes||

{{{
POST /services/ HTTP/1.1
Content-Length: 28
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded

RequestMethod=GetLibraryRoot
}}}

= Response Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* ||
||FolderID||UUID of the library root folder||UUID||
||OwnerID||UUID of the library owner||UUID||

{{{
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Date: Fri, 18 Dec 2009 18:39:25 GMT
Server: Apache/2.2.10 (Linux/SUSE)
X-Powered-By: Simian Grid Services
Content-Length: 100
Content-Type: application/json

{
  "FolderID":"99ffc001-40b6-47ee-92c1-d5be0bd71ea6",
  "OwnerID":"d52bbd77-8df6-4c4c-855f-d3fd1dda3600"
}
}}}

= Supported Response Codes =

  * 200
    * Request was successful
  * 404
    * Shared library does not exist
  * 500
    * Internal server error occurred
